title: Ticket!?
body: I made ticket 2 days ago, which was responded to almost immediately, which is great! I was asking for 22 RP, in which I would send a poem to them in return. I replied to the person who asked for the poem in return for some RP, and since then, I have been waiting for about 2 days for a response! Is this an average wait time for a type of ticket like this? I would like to get this RP as soon as possible!

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like the ticket was accidentally returned to our billing team's queue.  MarledFox has retrieved your ticket, and will continue assisting you personally.  You will be receiving a response as soon as possible!  Thanks for letting us know about that, and I love your poem by the way!
